verses.verse: Why <S%H4100><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> you afar <S%H7350><s%> off, O LORD? <S%H3068><s%> why hide <S%H5956><s%> you yourself in times <S%H6256><s%> of trouble? <S%H6869><s%>

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> in his pride <S%H1346><s%> does persecute <S%H1814><s%> the poor: <S%H6041><s%> let them be taken <S%H8610><s%> in the devices <S%H4209><s%> that they have imagined. <S%H2803><s%>

For the wicked <S%H7563><s%> boasts <S%H1984><s%> of his heart's <S%H5315><s%> desire, <S%H8378><s%> and blesses <S%H1288><s%> the covetous, <S%H1214><s%> whom the LORD <S%H3068><s%> abhors. <S%H5006><s%>

The wicked, <S%H7563><s%> through the pride <S%H1363><s%> of his countenance, <S%H639><s%> will not seek <S%H1875><s%> after God <S%H430><s%>: God is not in all <S%H3605><s%> his thoughts. <S%H4209><s%>

His ways <S%H1870><s%> are always <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6256><s%> grievous; <S%H2342><s%> your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are far <S%H5048><s%> above <S%H4791><s%> out of his sight: <S%H5048><s%> as for all <S%H3605><s%> his enemies, <S%H6887><s%> he puffs <S%H6315><s%> at them.
He has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> I shall not be moved: <S%H4131><s%> for I shall never <S%H1755><s%> be in adversity. <S%H7451><s%>

His mouth <S%H6310><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of cursing <S%H423><s%> and deceit <S%H4820><s%> and fraud: <S%H8496><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> his tongue <S%H3956><s%> is mischief <S%H5999><s%> and vanity. <S%H205><s%>

He sits <S%H3427><s%> in the lurking <S%H3993><s%> places of the villages: <S%H2691><s%> in the secret <S%H4565><s%> places does he murder <S%H2026><s%> the innocent: <S%H5355><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> are privately <S%H6845><s%> set <S%H6845><s%> against the poor. <S%H2489><s%>

He lies in wait <S%H693><s%> secretly <S%H4565><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> in his den: <S%H5520><s%> he lies in wait <S%H693><s%> to catch <S%H2414><s%> the poor: <S%H6041><s%> he does catch <S%H2414><s%> the poor, <S%H6041><s%> when he draws <S%H4900><s%> him into his net. <S%H7568><s%>
He crouches, <S%H1794><s%> and humbles <S%H7817><s%> himself, that the poor <S%H2489><s%> may fall <S%H5307><s%> by his strong <S%H6099><s%> ones.

He has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> God <S%H410><s%> has forgotten: <S%H7911><s%> he hides <S%H5641><s%> his face; <S%H6440><s%> he will never <S%H1074><s%> <S%H5331><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> it.
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> O God, <S%H410><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up your hand: <S%H3027><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> not the humble. <S%H6041><s%>
Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> does the wicked <S%H7563><s%> scorn <S%H5006><s%> God? <S%H430><s%> he has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> You will not require <S%H1875><s%> it.

You have seen <S%H7200><s%> it; for you behold <S%H5027><s%> mischief <S%H5999><s%> and spite, <S%H3708><s%> to requite <S%H5414><s%> it with your hand: <S%H3027><s%> the poor <S%H2489><s%> commits <S%H5800><s%> himself to you; you are the helper <S%H5826><s%> of the fatherless. <S%H3490><s%>

Break <S%H7665><s%> you the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the evil <S%H7451><s%> man: seek <S%H1875><s%> out his wickedness <S%H7562><s%> till you find <S%H4672><s%> none. <S%H1077><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is King <S%H4428><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever: <S%H5703><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> are perished <S%H6><s%> out of his land. <S%H776><s%>

LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you have heard <S%H8085><s%> the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the humble: <S%H6041><s%> you will prepare <S%H3559><s%> their heart, <S%H3820><s%> you will cause your ear <S%H241><s%> to hear: <S%H7181><s%>

To judge <S%H8199><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the oppressed, <S%H1790><s%> that the man <S%H582><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> may no <S%H1077><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> oppress. <S%H6206><s%>
